body.name: Blade Hawks RGB Gaming Headphone Stand with 3.5mm AUX and 2 USB Ports, Durable Headset Stand Holder for Bose, Beats, Sony, Sennheiser, Jabra, JBL, AKG, Fancy Gaming Accessories - HS18 (Only for PC)

features: RGB LIGHTING: Blade Hawks RGB headphones stand features RGB lights that run down the bottom. It has five light colors, breathing, and constant modes, which you can alter through the backlight switch. You can select the appropriate lighting effect for your desktop atmosphere. It’s definitely a cool gaming desk accessories. (Note: The RGB function is only activated when connecting the USB to a PC or Laptop. It cannot light up when connected to the sockets.)

2 USB PORTS & 1 AUX PORT: Two 2.0 USB ports can be utilized to transfer files and charge your smartphone, iPad, or any other smart device. You can also easily connect your keyboard, mouse, and RGB mouse pad. Plug & play, no additional drivers needed. The gaming headphone stand's Aux port allows a synchronous audio stream, which provides full-range stereo sound for wired headsets. (Note: This device does not allow wireless charging.)

SAFE AND STURDY: The headphone rest's sleek double frame provides stable and secure support for your headphone. The thicker base with four rubber pads on the bottom prevents the PC headphone stand from slipping, waving and tipping over. （Note: The headphone is not included.）

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: The gaming headset stand features 11.1 inches standing height. It supports headphones of all sizes, such as Bose, Beats, Sony, Panasonic, AKG, JBL, Audio-Technica, Sennheiser, Shure and more. Great PC headset holder for your desk setup and space-saving.

WHAT YOU GET: The PC headsets stand creates a fantastic gaming atmosphere at your preference. Perfect PC gamer setup accessories, best gifts for gamers, grandson, son, boy, man, husband and boyfriend. If you encounter problems while using the gaming headphone stand, we will provide easy-to-reach support.
body.description: Blade Hawks RGB Gaming Headset Stand Goodbye to The Messy Desk, Feel More Comfortable It allows headphones to sit comfortably on its stand as its stand on your desk, table or shelving unit. Helping you organize your desk, saving space. What It Fits for ? This universal and multifunctional headphone stand supports headphones of all sizes, such as Sennheiser 202 II HD598 HD 650 HD700, Dre Beats Beats Solo, Koss PortaPro, Sony MDR7506, Philips, AKG K612, Bose QC15, Hyper X Cloud II's, Astro A50's, AT M50's, and TB 420x, Audio-Technica, etc. Also this 2in1 cellphone stand holder fits for Appler iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 6, 6S Plus, 5S, SE, Samsung smart cellphones or iPad air, 4, 3, mini tablets etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the amazon orders where I think "Geez, this worked out!" The quality is better than I had expected, plastic but very sturdy and no cheap molding marks/lines. Looks good, works great. Proud to own it. One thing to keep in mind, the USB ports are USB2, not USB3, but both ports support data (ie, mouse/keypad and small data transfers) and the charge rate is fairly slow, but it works like a charm and if I'm at my desk anyway I don't need a super fast charger. More than enough for the headphones and my cell phone. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everyone loves this. The lights match our keyboards and speakers perfectly. But most importantly it keeps the headset off the desk. The two USB ports conveniently charge the headset as well and charge a phone. Great buy so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid option for a functional and cool looking headset stand.
reviews.reviewText: The blade hawks RGB gaming headset stand is an affordable option to the gamer who wants to customize their rig to fit their personality. The stand has 5 options of lighting ranging from individual breathing lights to RGB flow. Not only do the lights stand out and all look fantastic, but it is built to last. It is very sturdy and put together in a solid fashion. It does not require any assembly, just pull it out of the box, plug it in, and go. The AUX input and USB ports all worked fine and are functional if you want to use them. Just note that for the usb and AUX ports to work, the headset must be plugged in with the USB that provides power and audio capabilities, but that is explained well in the instructions. The only downside for me is that the lights will stay on even when the computer is put to sleep or turned completely off, but the easy work around is to use the light switch on the stand to turn the lights off when you are done playing if you do not want the lights on all the time. All in all, this is a solid, well-made, affordable gaming headset stand for any gaming rig.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The headset has USB passthrough. You can plug your headset directly into the stand.
reviews.reviewText: My wife got me this for fathers day. It is very sturdy and holds my headset perfectly. My favorite feature about this is the build in 3.5mm AUX port and USB passthrough. I can plug my headset directly into the headset stand and the computer recognizes the mic/speakers. The 2 USB ports on the stand are also very convenient for USB flash drives or other peripherals you need to plug in/unplug on a regular basis. I just downloaded and set up the 7.1 surround sound software and it sounds great. Also the RGB effect is kind of cool and doesn't seem way over the top like some effects I have seen. Solid product and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, functional stand
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, doesn't feel super cheap, functional USB passthrough.While I did run into an issue not long after plugging in this device, I am not convinced the issue was caused by this headphone stand. Roughly an hour after plugging this in, I had some trouble opened new tabs in web browsers and decided to reboot. On reboot I got a blue screen advising that windows drivers were missing and my system would not boot into windows. A simple repair with the install media fixed it. Deep virus can ran, and nothing showed up. So far no other issues. Just.. weird that this happened after connecting this device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Well built
reviews.reviewText: So you would think from the looks it looks cheaply built. That is the opposite it holds my headphones perfectly. It is super sturdy. The plastic is very nice and the lights are awesome. Instead of razers holder for like 100$ i would get this one. It was very well put together. The lights are incredible. My favorite part of the stand is how the BladeHawk Logo lights up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attention PS4/XBOX Users!!
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Sturdy stand with great materials. Lots of options for colors. ATTENTION PS4/XBOX this headset only lights up if you plug it into a computer USB drive. If you plug it into a wall USB charger it won't light up. The USB outlets in the stand will still provide power but it won't light up.I worked around this by plugging it into the usb port on my router and that allowed the light to work. If you are PC user you can just plug it into that.
Bought as gift so unsure but looks exactly as pictured!
Got this as a gift for my brother and he loves it.

reviews.reviewTitle: There is no sound or comfort LOL. It is a stand. sheesh
reviews.reviewText: I was going to buy a much more expensive version of this unit. I instead took a risk and bought this. It is a great headphone stand. Has two USB plugs on the side for charging other things as well. Great purchase and the RGB aspect is not overwhelming. It is just right and a great addition to my gaming setup.
Good quality, looks great and does the job perfectly. Recommended.
